posts.post_content: F/S I have a T-206 Topps Buyback Hall Baltimore Portrait that I would like for someone to have. Pretty nice card!  $35.00 delivered.  [url]mpowers23@verizon.net[/url]   :)  SOLD!

I will take it.  PMing you and email.

Doug
